text: Hello everyone ! How do you manage drag & drop templates for blog posts? We use flexible columns for our pages but it doesn't seem possible for blogs...

> Drag and drop areas can’t be used in <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/templates/blog-template-markup|blog listing, blog post>, and <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/templates#email|email templates> at this time.
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/tags/dnd-areas>

For more context: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CDU990ECW/p1583473549033600>
